con:part.con:content: <definitions name="ValidateCreditCard" targetNamespace="http://payment.com" xmlns:tns="http://payment.com" xmlns:types="http://payment.com/ValidateCreditCard" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <types> <schema targetNamespace="http://payment.com/ValidateCreditCard" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <complexType name="CreditCardType"> <sequence> <element name="ccType" type="string"/> <element name="ccNum" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="PaymentType"> <sequence> <element name="idOrder" type="string"/> <element name="CreditCard" type="types:CreditCardType"/> <element name="idCustomer" type="string"/> <element name="purchaseValue" type="decimal"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="CreditCard" type="types:CreditCardType"/> <element name="Payment" type="types:PaymentType"/> <element name="valid" type="boolean"/> <element name="isPaid" type="boolean"/> <element name="error" type="string"/> </schema> </types> <message name="CreditCardValidationRequestMessage"> <part name="CreditCard" element="types:CreditCard"/> </message> <message name="CreditCardValidationResponseMessage"> <part name="valid" element="types:valid"/> </message> <message name="CreditCardValidationFaultMessage"> <part name="error" element="types:error"/> </message> <message name="PaymentRequestMessage"> <part name="CreditCard" element="types:Payment"/> </message> <message name="PaymentResponseMessage"> <part name="payment" element="types:isPaid"/> </message> <message name="PaymentFaultMessage"> <part name="error" element="types:error"/> </message> <portType name="ValidateCreditCard"> <operation name="VerifyCC"> <input name="CreditCardInfo_Input" message="tns:CreditCardValidationRequestMessage"/> <output name="CreditCardInfo_Output" message="tns:CreditCardValidationResponseMessage"/> <fault name="CreditCardValidationFaultMessage" message="tns:CreditCardValidationFaultMessage"/> </operation> <operation name="Payment"> <input name="Payment_Input" message="tns:PaymentRequestMessage"/> <output name="Payment_Output" message="tns:PaymentResponseMessage"/> <fault name="PaymentFaultMessage" message="tns:PaymentFaultMessage"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="ValidateCreditCardBinding" type="tns:ValidateCreditCard"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="VerifyCC"> <soap:operation soapAction="VerifyCC"/> <input name="CreditCardInfo_Input"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output name="CreditCardInfo_Output"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="CreditCardValidationFaultMessage"> <soap:fault name="CreditCardValidationFaultMessage" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> <operation name="Payment"> <soap:operation soapAction="PaymentAction"/> <input name="Payment_Input"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output name="Payment_Output"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="PaymentFaultMessage"> <soap:fault name="PaymentFaultMessage" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> </binding> <service name="ValidateCreditCard"> <documentation>Payment service</documentation> <port name="ValidateCreditCard" binding="tns:ValidateCreditCardBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/PaymentApp/ValidateCreditCard"/> </port> </service> </definitions>
